text: Bella Vista is a corregimiento in Tolé District, Chiriquí Province, Panama. It has a land area of and had a population of 683 as of 2010, giving it a population density of . It was created by Law 10 of March 7, 1997; this measure was complemented by Law 5 of January 19, 1998 and Law 69 of October 28, 1998. Its population as of 2000 was 677. ==References== Category:Corregimientos of Chiriquí Province
title: Bella Vista, Chiriquí
